snippet: American lawmakers called for greater cooperation with Russia on intelligence and counterterrorism issues.
abstract: Members of United States Congressional delegation visit Moscow to investigate background of Boston Marathon bombing suspects; delegation announces that attack might have been prevented through greater cooperation between US and Russia on intelligence issues and counterterrorism efforts, but does not point to any specific missteps.
lead_paragraph: American lawmakers called for greater cooperation with Russia on intelligence and counterterrorism issues.

headline.seo: U.S. Lawmakers in Moscow in Inquiry on Boston Suspects
headline.main: Delegates Visit Moscow for Insight on Boston Attack
headline.print_headline: U.S. Lawmakers Visit Moscow for Insights Into Boston Bombing
